Harper Reed: Technology and death metal

Hacking, Baphomet and the real time internet
Hi. I am an engineer who builds paradigm-shifting tech and leads others to do the same. I love using the enormity of the Internet to bring people together, whether as CTO of Obama for America, CTO at Threadless.com, or on my own projects. You can often find me playing with new technology, looking for something to hack, or enjoying life in Chicago with my amazing wife, Hiromi. Check out my homepage and follow me on twitter.

all influence is immoral
Posted on Dec 12, 2003

I am watching wonder boys right now. it is so good. three movies I really enjoy are pirates of the caribbeans, wonder boys and o brother, where art thou. those movies are so good. I love them. heh. I LOVE johnny depp. heh. so good. I wish I could act like him forever. but alas.. I can't. today I went to the dentist and I later went shopping with my mom. I was able to find a blue screen of death shopping terminal. hehe. it ruled.

the computer I am using keeps beeping randomly. it is really weird.

my father is doing well. which is really nice. it is so good to hear him talk and to be able to hang out with him. it will be great to see him come home.

i have been doing work. I am tired of work. I want to play/sleep/get better.
